modName: The Sword of a Thousand Truths
summary: A natural upgrade to the Daedric Greatsword, inspired by SouthPark. This sword sports a special intricate glow, designed and handcrafted from scratch. It is an optimized and improved version of the Fallout:New vegas version Sword of the Thousand Truths.
descriptionHtml:
2 versions can be found at the Download section. Greatsword and Longsword.

Stats of Greatsword version: 
- Base DPS: 22 (Daedric Greatsword: 16)
- Base DMG: 26 (Daedric Greatsword: 24)
- Attack Speed: 0.95 (Daedric Greatsword: 0.7)
- Delay between swings: 0.75 (Longswords: 0.75) 
- Weight: 6.00

Stats of Longsword version:
- Base DPS: 18
- Base DMG: 18 
- Attack Speed: 1.0  
- Delay between swings: 0.75 (Longsword standard)
- Weight: 3.00


Features: 
- Craftable @ Smithing Forge under Daedric (Greatsword) and Glass (Longsword) category (2 x Malachite, 1 x Quicksilver, 1 x Ebony Ingot, 1 x Leather Strip, 1 x filled Grand Soulgem) 
- Improvable (1 x Dragonbone, 1 x filled Greater Soulgem) 
- Enchanteable
- Glows
- Lightweight, agile 2 hander, useful for parrying 
- Approved by Chuck Norris

Details: 
- Non exist in the World. Must be crafted. 
- Sword consist of 6248 Polygons
- Made a debute in Fallout: New Vegas, as a mod. Skyrim\'s version is vastly improved. 

Please let me know if there are any issues with it, and I shall endeavor to improve/fix it. 

Thank you :]
